transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, ji sir.
Customer: Namaste sir, mai Om baat kar raha hu aapka IndiaMART ka account se mujhe.
Executive: Yes.
Customer: Ji sir aapki abhi call aayi thi na mere paas?
Executive: Nahi mai call to isliye kar raha tha ke mera purana account manager hai na.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji.
Customer: Haan usse connect nahi ho raha hai isliye maine call kiya tha.
Executive: Achha aapko unse connect karna tha Pratibha ji se?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji ji ji aap mere ko bata dijiye sir abhi na mai aapka account handle karta hu sir aap mere ko bata dijiye ek baar kya aapko kuch wo issue aa raha tha sir?
Customer: Nahi wo baat sachi hai par isme kya tha.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji. Haan ke iske iska connect karna hai mere ko.
Executive: Achha aapko unse connect karna hai Pratibha ji se?
Customer: Haan Pratibha ji se baat kara dijiye mere ko.
Executive: Ji ji ji mai na unse ek baar bol dunga wo aapko call back kar lengi aaj. Aur sir mere ko ek cheez puchni thi. Jaise mai na abhi aap hi un meri abhi sir se hi baat hui thi unhone kaha ki aap hi handle karte hain. To mai na aaj aapko call bhi karne wala tha sir hum na jo hamare sare products hain.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Jo humne catalog mein list kar rakhe hain. Aapne bhi sir notice kara hoga ki hamare paas na un sare products ki humping queries nahi aa rahi hain.
Customer: Humping queries kuch hi products ki aati hai matlab mai batata hu kaunsi wali major products ki aati hai hamare paas inquiries.
Executive: Ek minute dijiye mai to hamara account khol leta hu mai.
Executive: Ji. Hamare paas na sir inquiries jo hain wo majorly hamare iski aati hai aapne notice kara hoga ceiling cloth dryer jo hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Iski zyada aati hain. Aur hamare jo baaki cheeze hain cloth drying stand hai, bathroom wall shelves hai aur ye hamara towel rod aur baaki jitne hain unki hamare paas itni nahi aati sir hai na? Aapne notice kara hai ye cheez.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To ye na sir isme ye hua hai na ki hamara jab account bana bana tha na.
Customer: Haan haan. Jab humne hamari service chalu hui thi. Hamare ko majorly kya hua hamare ko majorly jo wo dikhi.
Customer: By-lead hum consume karte hain na.
Executive: To jo humne major buyleads dekhi wo sari ki sari isi cheez ki dikhi. Jo hamara ye wo hai standing wala jo cloth dryer hai ceiling cloth dryer. Iski hamare ko zyada hamare ko wo dikhi buyleads. To usse kya hua na usse website ke hisab se jo hamara ye wala product hai. Ye hamara major product ban gaya. To isse kya ho raha hai na abhi aapke paas jo hai inquiries and calls bhi relatedly major matlab zyadatar isi isi ek product ki aa rahi hai. Lekin jaise ki mai hamare isme dekh pa raha hu hamare to lagbhag sare hi product major rahe hain na sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Matlab aisa koi jaise mere ko hamari product line lagi usme mere ko aisa hi lag raha hai ki hamare to sare hi product major se hi hain matlab aisa koi ek single product hamara ye nahi hai ki hum majorly deal karenge.
Customer: To isme kya aayega sir buyleads to mere se pehle se bhi nahi aa rahi hai wo to mera do baar to maine tickets bhi raise ki hai.
Customer: Bhai aisa chalta hai to mai kya karu? Haan teen baar teen chaar baar maine.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan teen chaar baar maine to kar diya hai teen chaar baar maine ko bola tha wo sab kiya bhi hai.
Executive: Achha achha. Haan wo wo aa nahi rahi hai to ye problem to chal raha pehle se hi.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji to mai wohi cheez bata raha hu sir isme na hum ek kaam kar sakte hain. Ya to aisa karta hu mai mai bhi aapko jo hai buyleads share kar dunga. Jo buyleads rehti hai na sir aapki. Ab kaise share karoge sir ji mere ko?
Customer: Jaise jaise aap sir bhai mai waise ek baar pehle batata hu aap sir filters lagate ho jab buyleads consume karne jaate ho?
Customer: Haan ya isme kya hai mai aapko sach hai wo mai bolta hu aapko. Jab mai hum do log hain do log ek sath mein account handle karte hain kyunki kya hai ke hum kabhi hum free hote to hum dekhte hain wo free hote to wo dekhte hain.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Haan to isme ye hai ke jab bhi hum bulk lead mein filter lagaye bulk mein India pura India aisa nahi hai ke bhai Gujarat mein hi karta hu Madhya Pradesh mein karta hu aisa nahi. India ka filter pehle lagata hu dusri baar bulk ka lagata hu to mere paas aap abhi bhi try karna hai to bhi kar lijiye mere account mein jaake bulk ki lead to pehle se bhi aa hi nahi rahi hai to maine to bulk ki lead to chhod di. Dusra to ye hai ke jab maine product list ki hai iski buylead mil hi nahi rahi hai.
Executive: Achha achha.
Customer: Aur teen din teen se chaar din teen se chaar din pehle bhi mere ek sath fraud ho gaya sir ji.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan iske regarding aaj mere ko account manager se contact karna hai mere ko.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji haan ji to iske regarding na agar mai aapke aaj kisi time 10-15 minute ka samay nikal payega sir?
Customer: Haan nikal payega na sir ji kaise nahi niklega?
Executive: Ji. Haan niklega niklega.
Customer: Nikal jayega? Haan abhi bhi nikal jayega. Aapke liye to mai time de paunga na sir ji.
Executive: Nikal jayega. Haan sir meeting karni hai na sir ji aapko.
Executive: Ji ji ji mai samajh gaya sir. Ye wala koi baat nahi. Haan mai isse resolve karwata hu sir aur mai ye keh raha tha agar mai aapko abhi video meet ka link bheju aur mai apni screen share karunga. Isme na aapko screen share karke easily samjha dunga mai isme hum kya kar sakte hain bulk wala filter nahi lagana sir hume isme.
Customer: Koi koi baat nahi chalo mere ko ek hai na mere liye Google Meet ki link bhejo mai abhi connect ho raha hu theek hai sir.
Executive: Bheju sir aapko? Haan.
Executive: Ji. Theek hai sir aapke na email pe bhi aa gaya hoga aur mai aapko aapke whatsapp number bhi bhej de raha hu. Aur iske baad na sir jaise aapko explain karunga iske baad mai ek hamara ek cheez aur batata hu aapko isme na hum ek solution aur kar sakte hain. Jaise abhi ek minute dijiye.
Executive: Sir aap apna whatsapp wala number bataiyega mere ko?
Customer: 998171
Executive: Hello.
Customer: 998171
Executive: 998171 532
Customer: 532
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Ji sir ek baar check kariye aap pe aaya hoga ek video meet ka link.
Customer: Haan sir ji mil gaya.
Executive: Ji. Isme link nahi hai sir ji.
Customer: Sir uske liye na aapko mera number save karna padega aap na mera number save kar lijiye usse aapko link show ho jayega wo abhi aap hoga. Hmm number save mai karunga bache mere paas kya hai ke web web whatsapp se maine kiya hai. Waha se to nahi ho payega. One minute.
Customer: Ho gaya sir. Tame je vyakti ne call karyo chhe tene tamaro call hold par rakhya chhe. Kripa kari line par raho. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Tame je vyakti ne call karyo chhe tene tamaro call hold par rakhya chhe. Kripa kari line par raho. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Tame je vyakti ne call karyo chhe tene tamaro call hold par rakhya chhe. Kripa kari line par raho. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Tame je vyakti ne call karyo chhe tene tamaro call hold par rakhya chhe. Kripa kari line par raho. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Tame je vyakti ne call karyo chhe tene tamaro call hold par rakhya chhe. Kripa kari line par raho. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to connect with previous account manager.

- Not receiving buyleads for all listed products.

- Experienced a fraud incident recently.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to share buyleads.

- Executive will share a video meet link.

- Executive will explain how to resolve issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to share video meet link.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account manager, fraud, video meet
